text:
Parents Can Now Access Student Grades Online
SET-126-2024
December 05, 2024
The Tamaulipas State Secretary of Education has announced the launch of a new online platform allowing parents and guardians to convenient access their children’s elementary school grades.
Marcela Ramírez Jordán, Undersecretary of Basic Education, responsible for the initiative, confirmed that the grades corresponding to the first evaluation period of the 2024-2025 school year are now readily available for families to review. The platform also grants access to previous school cycles.
“We have done this to guarantee timely and transparent access to students’ academic information,” Ramírez Jordan emphasizes, highlighting its alignment with the official school activities calendar. He added that parents and guardians can access the platform’s grade consultation service on the official website of the Ministry of Education.
Simple Online Access for Parents
***
Finding the necessary information is straightforward, according to officials. The Comprehensive Educational Information System ( SIIE ) website houses the “Grade Consultation” option under its “Online Services” menu. Accessing student grades is as simple as entering their CURP (Unique Population Registry Code) and selecting the appropriate academic term.
Thisone-stop shop for academic progress aligns with the Américo Villarreal Anaya administration’s commitment to enhance service accessibility through modern digital portals improved administrative efficiency. ”
“We want to make life easier for parents and guardians,” added Ramírez Jordan, acknowledging the significance of transparency and streamlined access to key educational data.
